roleset.name: compete, vie

example.name: Arg2 & MNR
example.text: The teams were in fierce competition for first place.

example.name: Arg0 (competitors in one mention) & Arg2
example.text: Natural selection involves competition among organisms for available resources.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry compete.01, OntoNotes grouping compete-n sense 1; maps to VN class battle-36.4-1. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Arg1 & MNR
example.text: John's love for Mary led to bitter competition with Jack.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Late last month, she scored a coup in her competition with Senator Obama for black and religious voters.
